file_content.text: Hah! Stupid Ug-men! That show them not to mess with Jawas!
New friend was great! Blizz think new friend do good!
Boss was great! Blizz miss helping boss!
Boss, Jreely find little box like Jedi-man want! Look!
(Force Sensitive Background) That's not a holocron. Looks like an old holoprojector.
Looks like a holoprojector.
Uh huh, Blizz think that right. Look old and cheap. Guess Jedi poor. Blizz hope he have credits!
That's that then.
Now we get pay!
Doesn't look important enough for all this trouble.
What important is that Jedi-man pay for it!
Hello! Hello! Jedi-man? Blizz have good news!
Are you calling from a bathroom? I mean, I felt that we would speak soon. I'd hoped sooner.
Your device is safe, we'll return it shortly.
(Smuggler Background) Something about that voice.... Hey let me--
What is this thing?
Who's that? I'm not paying for questions.
You aren't the only one.
Boss! Don't embarrass Blizz in front of client!
Um, Blizz trying to have private business call. New friend wait!
Blizz have little box Jedi-man want!
Uh, that's great! Wait, you didn't open it, did you? Don't open it.
Um, Blizz not open yet. Just find thing. Now Blizz curious.
Don't open it! I--I won't pay otherwise!
We won't open it.
Good!
He's your client, but I think we should open it.
Sounds like this might be worth something to another buyer.
I seriously doubt it!
It's, uh, sentimental.
Blizz think this cost extra. Jedi-man never say Blizz can't open and now Blizz be up all night wondering.
What...? Okay--okay--okay! Fine! Just get it back to me soon. Unopened. And don't think I won't know. I'm a Jedi.
Okay. Bye Jedi-man.
This work out good for Blizz and crew. Blizz owe new friend for all new friend help! Blizz ready to hear about new friend job!
Come to Odessen and we'll discuss the details.
I look forward to working with you Blizz.
Blizz too!
Don't think I'll be paying you anything. This is payback for my help here.
Blizz think that fair.
Blizz guess you boss now, but Blizz boss also... new friend can be Big Boss!
See! Blizz do good work! Boss ready for Blizz and crew to come work for boss?
You can join up with the rest of my operation on Odessen. We'll get you up to speed.
Welcome back, little guy. You've made me proud.
Yay! Blizz knew Blizz do good for boss!
Keep your little friends in line. They cause me any trouble and it's you I'll be dealing with.
Don't worry! Blizz run tight ship! Even Jreely behave!
Grr.
Right?
Yes, boss....
Hmm, boss always been Blizz boss, but now Blizz boss too... how about boss be Big Boss? Blizz think it fit!
Whatever you like, Blizz.
Has a nice ring to it. Sure beats, "Commander."
Bleh. Blizz think Big Boss right. Blizz make sure people know boss is Big Boss now.
Maybe it'll keep you from forgetting who's in charge.
Nope! Big Boss always be boss!
Bye-bye, Big Boss! Blizz and crew take box to Jedi-man now. See you soon!
Hey! New friend! Blizz have good news!
Boss! Blizz have good news!
Blizz crew find lead on little Jedi-man box!
What have you found out?
So the gadgets I've been delivering did result in something.
Oh! No, that not really help at all!
Spit it out.
Blizz spot little Ug-man poking around starship dead-place, so Blizz follow and find whole crew of Ug-men stealing salvage!
They have ship that Jedi-man say he stash little box in! Blizz going take posse and get box. New friend want to come?
They have ship that Jedi-man say he stash little box in! Blizz going take posse and get box. Boss want to come?
Alright, Blizz, let's wrap this up.
Ug-men?
Yeah, Ug-men! Um, usually fat, have pig-face... mean and stupid!
Only because you've put me in the mood to hurt something.
Blizz show Ug-men Blizz and crew not mess around. Ug-men just give up probably.
Meet Blizz and crew at Ug-man camp!
Oh, boss back! Blizz still have some things to take to crew if boss want to help now.
New friend back! Blizz still have few things to take to crew if new friend have time now.
[Refuse Quest] I was hoping you'd be done already.
White-sand crawler too slow and Blizz only carry so much! Blizz get done eventually.
Blizz have good news! White-sand crawler base all finished!
Blizz just need to finish little job and Blizz be ready to help new friend!
Important Jedi-man hire Blizz and crew to hunt little box he leave in starship dead-place.
Shouldn't you have been able to retrieve it by now?
Blizz and crew get kind of distracted finding parts for new white-sand crawler and not have reason to rush until boss come back!
Blizz and crew get kind of distracted finding parts for new white-sand crawler, but that all done. Plus new friend give Blizz reason to hurry.
(Force Sensitive Background) You mean a holocron?
Um... maybe?
A little box?
Yup!
No wonder he hired Jawas.
Blizz and crew the best at finding good things in wrecks! Plus Blizz crew pretty good at beating up pirates too!
Jedi-man tell Blizz where to find little box, but when Blizz and crew look ship gone!
Blizz think what left of White Maw pirates maybe salvage wreck. It strange though.
Strange how?
The White Maw are still operating out here?
They get beat up real good, but not go away. Then Republic-people and Empire-people get bored of ice place and White Maw get big again.
Not much of a trail to go on.
Nope.
White Maw sloppy. They only take best parts and leave rest. Not usually take whole ship. Blizz not even find loose screws!
Blizz make things to help crew hunt. Boss give to crew, maybe show new hunters how job done?
Blizz make things to help crew hunt. New friend give to crew so we finish soon?
I can do that.
Can't you or Jreely do it?
Blizz and Jreely taking things too!
It just faster if boss help.
[Refuse Quest] I don't have time to train your crew.
Aww.... Blizz sorry boss. Blizz work real fast to finish job!
It just faster if new friend help.
Fair enough. Let's get it done.
Yay! Boss the best!
Yay! New friend the best!
Preeti need vibro-ear, um, R'bik D'nec get laser-torch, Dakk'ik... Blizz think Dakk'ik's womp rat freeze so he get sniff-machine. Oh, and Nu'na get socks.
I'll be back soon.
How's this stuff supposed to help find your Jedi's box?
Preeti snoop lots and hear good, Blizz think you call it nosey. Blizz not really understand. Dakk'ik track things. Nu'na scout fast. R'bik always get in and out of things.
Socks. Really?
Uh-huh, Blizz fill with Wampa fur and powerpacks! They always get hot when Blizz charge.
Blizz sure his crew do good with new supplies! Bye-bye, Blizz talk soon!
[Refuse Quest] I don't have time for this right now.
It faster if new friend help. Blizz guess Blizz start locking down white-sand crawler then.
Ooo! Ooo! Blizz almost have everything Blizz need for white-sand crawler base to be finished!
Blizz make lot of fixes to white-sand crawler! Windows not fog up and refresher flush again! It still not move though.
Could you try fixing something more important next time?
Those things important! Blizz think stranger-person never try going in white sands or they understand.
[Give 1 Salvage] Whatever helps.
Fine, I don't have anything right now anyway.
Blizz sorting junk crew and stranger-person bring. It good, but Blizz need more!
Blizz still missing lots of part for white-sand crawler. Stranger-person find anything good?
[Give 1 Salvage] I've brought you some salvage.
Yay! Thanks, stranger-person! Blizz know what Blizz do with this!
I'll keep looking.
Blizz sure stranger-person find things soon. There lots of good parts in white sands!
Stranger-person decide to help Blizz now?
Okay, I'll help you fix your snow crawler.
Yay! Bring Blizz good parts, okay?
[Give Salvage] I already brought you some.
Stranger-person the best! Blizz thank!
Okay.
[Refuse Quest] I'm still not collecting garbage for you.
Blizz not want garbage! Only good parts. Jreely tell you I want garbage? Stupid Jreely.
Jreely! Blizz need new roto-hammer!
What Blizz want Jreely do about roto-hammer? Blizz build only one. Why anyone else make stupid roto-hammer?
Roto-hammer only stupid to stupid-Jawa like Jreely. Do exactly what Blizz want, not like stupid Jreely.
Oh! Boss! Boss! Boss! Boss finally find Blizz! Jreely look! It Blizz boss!
Jreely? Wasn't that the name of the guy who sold you out?
Yup! Stupid Jreely think he be better off with White Maw, but he wrong. Blizz think Jreely learned lesson, so Blizz help Jreely escape.
Hey, little guy. Didn't figure I'd find you back here again.
That why it take boss so long to find Blizz?
Calm. Down. Blizz.
Aww, but boss! How Blizz supposed to be calm when boss finally back?
Oh! Hi, Jedi-person!
Oh! Hi, scary-person!
Oh! Hi, stranger-person!
We here first! You not try anything!
Shh! Jreely shut big mouth! Maybe strange-person just lost, or customer!
I'm not lost, just looking for something.
Oh! So stranger-person is customer! It Blizz job to find things!
Are you peddlers? You're literally in the last place anyone would want to visit.
I have no interest in buying whatever junk you're here collecting.
Oh, Blizz not sell things, Blizz find things for people!
Do I want to know what a roto-hammer is?
It great! It spin, and, um, it hammer and... it make Blizz hands numb, but in fun way. It handy for Blizz work!
Blizz own boss now, have crew and everything! Blizz crew hunt scrap and salvage and Hoth have lot of both, so Blizz build base!
Blizz make sand crawler into white-sand crawler! It, um, not finished yet. Blizz think maybe parts lost rebuilding.
I'm glad you're here. I could use your help with something.
Blizz always ready to help boss!
You built this huge thing yourself?
Oh, no, Blizz crew help build half.
"Lost." I don't know how anything could go missing with a bunch of Jawas around.
Blizz think Blizz crew borrowing parts for things that not white-sand crawler.
That's a good instinct.
Blizz get things fixed, don't worry!
You shouldn't let your own people steal from you, you gotta put your foot down.
Blizz know! Blizz put foot other places and it work great!
I was really hoping your grasp of Basic would have come farther in five years.
Blizz get better! Learn that some words sound same but mean different thing and other words look same but mean different thing!
Blizz still not learn why though.
It's not really important right now.
Okay, Blizz sure boss know what boss talking about even if Blizz don't!
Oh, well, I take it back.
Blizz get it soon, Blizz promise!
That's great Blizz. How about sarcasm?
Blizz thought that funny space word for big toothy pit in dune sea, but Blizz learn it how to talk smarter than other people.
Boss must be super smart to know how to use!
Blizz happy boss come back and find Blizz. Boss want Blizz and crew to help hunt bounty?
[Show Tech] I could use a hand with something. Seen one of these before?
I'm after bigger game than bounties these days, but you're always welcome to hunt with me.
[Show Tech] One of you is hard enough to keep tabs on. Just tell me if you recognize this thing.
Blizz big time salvage runner now!
[Show Tech] How much to hire you? I need to locate where this came from.
Never heard of a Jawa freelancing before.
Blizz only one! Or Blizz was only one until Blizz hire crew, they still count for Blizz though.
That's the most ridiculous thing I've ever heard.
Bad people Blizz meet on salvage runs say that a lot. Blizz think it funny, mean people always easiest to beat up!
Blizz learn from Grand Champion of Great Hunt! Travel all over space before stupid emperor-man ruin everything.
[Show Tech] Maybe you've seen one of these in your travels?
[Show Tech] Okay, fine, you're a salvage runner. Help me find more objects like this.
Oh! Blizz been looking for that! Blizz thought Blizz lose forever on shaky-planet that fall apart. Thanks!
You know where more tech like that exists?
Um, Blizz have all sort of tech like that.
Shaky planet?
Boss not remember shaky planet with ice "topes"? Blizz like it there, but maybe just when less shaky.
Yeah, Blizz go there with old boss because Imp-people want ice "topes." Blizz not think it much like ice here though.
Blizz drop this when planet being really shaky and not have time to go back for it.
Hey! I didn't say you could have that.
But--it Blizz's!
Blizz make this for cleaning. Make things not stick to other things. Blizz finally keep grease out of robes again!
That saves me some trouble. I was sent to find the inventor and recruit them.
Yay! Blizz come help boss free of charge!
Suddenly, Doctor Oggurobb's note makes a lot more sense.
Doctor Ogg person who find Blizz tech?
He's nobody, forget it. Just get your crew together so we can get out of here.
You made this? Doctor Oggurobb said it defied all known laws of engineering.
Blizz make lots of things! Who this Doctor Ogg person who say Blizz's things not legal?
He's a scientist who admires your work. He sent me to find you.
Oh! Boss want Blizz to help boss again? Blizz love to help boss! But, um....
A Hutt who thinks you're important. He can determine that himself.
I want to see some proof that your claim is true.
Ooo! Still works!
Blizz glad stranger-person find Blizz things, but why stranger-person looking for Blizz stuff?
It's not your stuff I'm interested in, it's your talents.
Since you're so glad to have your lost item back, how about paying me back in some way?
Stranger-person want to hire Blizz?
Blizz would like to help stranger-person, but Blizz under contract. Plus Blizz have white-sand crawler base to finish. Sorry!
What can I do to persuade you?
How about I help with your job?
Oh, Blizz not supposed to talk about business. It confidential! How Blizz even know if stranger-person any good?
Blizz can always use new parts for white-sand crawler. Stranger-person find good salvage, Blizz think maybe they help with other jobs, too.
I'll see what I can dig up.
Oh! Blizz like stranger-person! Blizz be here working. Unlike Jreely!
Grr.
[Refuse Quest] I'm not digging through junk for you.
Aww, that okay. It job for professional anyway.
[Refuse Quest] Have fun with that.
Bye-bye, stranger-person! Maybe next time Blizz not be so busy!
That's it? That slug made it sound like you reinvented the hyperdrive.
Lots of Blizz things get stuck together, so it super helpful! Blizz not sure why Blizz would reinvent thing if it already invented.
Blizz like to thank boss for bringing Blizz stuff back! Blizz work for boss free of charge! But, um....
Free? Free!
Blizz need to finish job Blizz doing here first. Blizz always finish job like boss taught.
What's the job? Maybe I can help.
Just like I taught.
Oh, that you were paying attention to. Figures.
Yup!
Blizz and crew find anything! For right price.
[Give 5 Salvage] I've brought you some salvage.
[Give 5 Salvage] Whatever helps.
New friend the best!
Boss the best!
